footer.description: AI focus companion designed for ADHD users

stillNeedHelp.title: Still Need Help?
stillNeedHelp.subtitle: If your question hasn't been answered above, or if you have any feature suggestions and feedback, we'd love to hear from you!
stillNeedHelp.responseTime: We will reply to your email within 24-48 hours

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: Your privacy is critically important to us. This policy details how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: Welcome to Dopamind! We are committed to providing you with a secure and reliable AI companion to help you manage tasks and enhance focus. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, protect, and handle your personal information when you use our services.

dataCollection.title: Information We Collect
dataCollection.subtitle: To provide and improve our services, we collect the following types of information:

directInfo.title: Information You Provide Directly
items: Account Information: Nickname, email address, and encrypted password
Task and Habit Data: Tasks you create, habits you set, completion records, etc.
AI Conversation Records: Your conversation history with Dopamind AI for personalized suggestions
Preference Settings: App settings, notification preferences, theme choices, etc.

autoInfo.title: Automatically Collected Information
items: Usage Data: App usage duration, feature usage frequency, etc. (anonymized)
Device Information: Device model, operating system version, app version
Technical Data: IP address, device identifiers (for technical support only)

items.title: Provide and Maintain Services
items.description: Create and manage your account, sync your data, and enable you to use all App features

items.title: Personalize Your Experience
items.description: AI uses your task and conversation history to provide more relevant, personalized suggestions and encouragement

items.title: Improve Our Products
items.description: Analyze anonymous usage data to understand feature usage and optimize product design

items.title: Communicate With You
items.description: Send important service notifications, updates, or provide support when you contact us

dataSharing.title: How We Share Your Information
dataSharing.promise: We do not sell, rent, or otherwise disclose your personal information to third parties, except in the following circumstances:
exceptions: Service Providers: We may share necessary information with trusted third-party service providers, such as cloud storage and data analytics services, but they can only use this information under our direction
Legal Requirements: We may disclose information when required by law or to protect our rights, property, or safety
Business Transfers: In the event of a merger, acquisition, or asset sale, your information may be transferred as part of business assets

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.subtitle: We employ industry-standard security measures to protect your personal information:

measures.title: Data Encryption
measures.description: End-to-end encryption during transmission and storage

measures.title: Access Control
measures.description: Strict employee access permissions and audit systems

userRights.title: Your Rights and Choices
userRights.subtitle: You have the following rights regarding your data:

rights.title: üìã Access & Update
rights.description: You can view and modify your nickname, email, and avatar anytime in the App's 'Account Information' page

rights.title: üì§ Data Export
rights.description: You can contact us to request a copy of your personal data

rights.title: üóëÔ∏è Account Deletion
rights.description: You can permanently delete your account in the App's 'Account Information' page. This will delete all your personal data and cannot be recovered

rights.title: üîî Push Notifications
rights.description: You can enable or disable Dopamind's push notification permissions anytime in your device's system settings

childrenPrivacy.title: Children's Privacy
childrenPrivacy.content: Our services are not directed at children under 13. We do not knowingly collect personally identifiable information from children under 13. If we discover that we have inadvertently collected such information, we will take immediate steps to delete it. If you are a parent or guardian and you know that your child has provided us with personal information, please contact us.

policyChanges.title: Policy Changes
policyChanges.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. If we make significant changes, we will notify you through the following methods:
methods: Send emails to your registered email address
Post update notices on this website

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy, please feel free to contact us:
contact.responseTime: We will respond to your inquiry within 48 hours.

download.title: Download Dopamind for Android
download.subtitle: Experience Dopamind's powerful features on your Android device

hero.title: Stay Focused, Anywhere
hero.description: Download Dopamind for Android and let your AI assistant accompany you every day.

requirements.title: System Requirements
items: At least 100 MB of available storage space
Network connection (for sync and AI features)

installation.title: Installation Steps
installation.warning: ‚ö†Ô∏è Please ensure you download the APK file from official sources before installation

steps.title: Download APK File
steps.description: Click the download button above to save the APK file to your device

steps.title: Allow Unknown Sources
steps.description: Go to Settings > Security > Install unknown apps, and enable permission for your browser or file manager

steps.title: Install App
steps.description: Find the downloaded APK file, tap it and follow the prompts to complete installation

steps.title: Get Started
steps.description: Open the app, create an account or sign in to your existing account, and begin your focus journey

items.title: Digital Signature Verification
items.description: All APK files are officially digitally signed to ensure file integrity and trusted source

items.title: Malware Scanning
items.description: Every release is rigorously scanned for security to ensure no malicious code

items.title: Privacy Protection
items.description: Follows the same privacy policy, ensuring your data security is fully protected

items.question: Why isn't it available on Google Play Store?
items.answer: We are actively preparing for Google Play Store listing. In the meantime, you can experience full functionality through the official APK file.

items.question: Is the APK file safe?
items.answer: Yes, our APK files are officially signed and rigorously security tested. Please ensure you download from the official website to guarantee safety.

items.question: How do I update the app?
items.answer: When a new version is released, you can revisit this page to download the latest APK file and install the update.

items.question: What if I encounter installation issues?
items.answer: Please check the installation steps above and ensure you have enabled unknown source installation permission. If you still have issues, please contact our support team.

items.title: Quick Actions
items.description: Support Android shortcuts for quickly adding tasks and launching focus mode

items.title: Smart Notifications
items.description: Deep integration with Android notification system for smarter reminder functionality

items.title: Material Design
items.description: Fully compliant with Material Design guidelines for a native Android experience

support.title: Need Help?
support.description: If you encounter any issues during download or installation, our support team is here to help.

accountDeletion.title: Dopamind Account & Data Deletion Guide
accountDeletion.subtitle: Learn how to permanently delete your Dopamind account and all associated data

items.title: Open Dopamind app and log in
items.description: Make sure you are logged into the account you want to delete

items.title: Go to 'Profile' page
items.description: Tap 'Profile' in the bottom navigation bar of the app

items.title: Tap 'Account Info'
items.description: Find and tap 'Account Info' on your profile page

items.title: Tap 'Permanently Delete Account' button
items.description: At the bottom of the Account Info page, tap the red 'Permanently Delete Account' button

items.title: Enter password for final confirmation
items.description: Follow the on-screen prompts and enter your account password for final confirmation

dataInfo.title: Important Data Information
dataInfo.warning: Please note: Account deletion is an irreversible operation!
dataInfo.description: Once confirmed, all your personal information and data will be permanently deleted and cannot be recovered.

deletedData.title: The following data will be permanently deleted:
items: All personal information (nickname, email, avatar, etc.)
All task records and completion history
All habit data and tracking records
All other data associated with your account

confirmation.title: Confirmation Requirements
confirmation.description: To ensure account security, the deletion operation requires the following conditions:
requirements: Enter your current account login password
Confirm that you understand the irreversible nature of this operation
Agree to waive all rights to data recovery

support.title: Need Help?
support.description: If you encounter any issues during the deletion process, or have any questions, please contact our support team:
support.subject: Email Subject
support.responseTime: We will reply to your email within 24-48 hours

alternatives.title: Other Options Before Deletion
alternatives.description: Before permanently deleting your account, you may also consider the following alternatives:

options.title: Pause Usage
options.description: You can delete the app but keep your account, and reinstall and restore data anytime

options.title: Data Export
options.description: Contact support team to export a backup of your personal data

options.title: Cancel Subscription
options.description: If you just want to stop paying, you can cancel subscription separately without deleting the account

options.title: Contact Support
options.description: If you encounter issues, our team is happy to help you
